title: ARC FLASH PROTECTION BOUNDARY
fullText:
boundary marked by the distance from electrical equipment at which the arc flash incident energy is equal to 1.2 cal/cm2
Note 1 to entry: The arc flash boundary is used to define where personal protective equipment (PPE) may be required for the protection from burns.
Note 2 to entry: PPE is rated in calories (symbol: cal), therefore the unit joules is not used in this application.
